TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit WmfPlaceableFileHeader extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Defines a placeable metafile. Not inheritable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Placeable metafiles provide a nonstandard way to specify how a metafile is mapped and scaled on an output device.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets or sets the y-coordinate of the lower-right corner of the bounding rectangle of the metafile image on the output device.
Docs.value: The y-coordinate of the lower-right corner of the bounding rectangle of the metafile image on the output device.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The coordinates of the bounding rectangle are measured in twips.

Docs.returns: The y-coordinate of the lower-right corner of the bounding rectangle of the metafile image on the output device.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the bounding rectangle of the metafile image on the output device.
Docs.value: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the bounding rectangle of the metafile image on the output device.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The coordinates of the bounding rectangle are measured in twips.

Docs.returns: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the bounding rectangle of the metafile image on the output device.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the x-coordinate of the lower-right corner of the bounding rectangle of the metafile image on the output device.
Docs.value: The x-coordinate of the lower-right corner of the bounding rectangle of the metafile image on the output device.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The coordinates of the bounding rectangle are measured in twips.

Docs.returns: The x-coordinate of the lower-right corner of the bounding rectangle of the metafile image on the output device.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the bounding rectangle of the metafile image on the output device.
Docs.value: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the bounding rectangle of the metafile image on the output device.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The coordinates of the bounding rectangle are measured in twips.

Docs.returns: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the bounding rectangle of the metafile image on the output device.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the checksum value for the previous ten s in the header.
Docs.value: The checksum value for the previous ten s in the header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This value can be used in an attempt to detect whether the metafile has become corrupted. The checksum is calculated by joining each `WORD` value to an initial value of 0 by using the `XOR` operator.

Docs.returns: The checksum value for the previous ten s in the header.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the handle of the metafile in memory.
Docs.value: The handle of the metafile in memory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When written to disk, this property is not used and always contains the value 0.

Docs.returns: The handle of the metafile in memory.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the number of twips per inch.
Docs.value: The number of twips per inch.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Normally, there are 1440 twips per inch; however, this number can be changed to scale the image. A value of 720 indicates that the image is double its normal size, or scaled to a factor of 2:1. A value of 360 indicates a scale of 4:1. Conversely, a value of 2880 indicates that the image is scaled down in size by a factor of two. A value of 1440 indicates a 1:1 scale ratio.

Docs.returns: The number of twips per inch.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the presence of a placeable metafile header.
Docs.value: A value indicating presence of a placeable metafile header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This field always has a value of 0x9AC6CDD7.

Docs.returns: A value indicating presence of a placeable metafile header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Always set this field to zero.
